function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Ineffective park closure as a response to controlling contagion","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Closure of parks not enforced","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of personnel to enforce safety protocols","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Desire to open parks without adequate safety measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased demand for park access leading to overcrowding","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental health issues due to restricted access to green spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate resources for maintaining safe park environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of access to parks leading to mental health issues, physical inactivity, and domestic violence consequences","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowding in less ventilated and denser spaces due to park closures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Closure of small gyms leading to reliance on crowded parks for exercise","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Scarce personnel to monitor compliance with protocols","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance with curfew measures and park restrictions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Demand for park access leading to non-compliance with safety measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social resistance to following minimal protocol requests such as mask use and distancing.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vandalism of warning resources such as yellow ribbons and banners.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowding in restricted areas and resistance to park closures by some users.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance with closure rules and mobility restrictions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of restrictions around urban green spaces leading to complaints from drivers and traffic accidents","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vandalism of yellow ribbons used to enclose restricted areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evasion of restrictions by young people during nights","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impromptu protocols and loose guidelines from national governments may lead to ineffective or insufficient protocols for using public spaces, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in adapting personnel to perform new tasks may lead to inadequate enforcement of disease prevention measures and inefficient management of public events.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the duration of the measures may lead to inadequate long-term planning, affecting budget allocation and personnel tasks.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in funding for public agencies responsible for urban green spaces may result in insufficient resources to implement effective disease prevention measures and maintain the facilities.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in enforcement leading to varying levels of actual mobility","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent communication and response to pandemic urgency","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in designing mobility protocols for urban green spaces","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of enforcement of social distancing measures in public spaces","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent implementation of lockdown directives and measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in implementing social distancing measures in some countries","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of transmission of contagious diseases in crowded urban green spaces","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of financial instability due to covid-19 impact on visitor numbers and funding sources","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of community transmission and outbreak in nearby communities due to park-related activities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on permits and services for park funding","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of biodiversity protection in urban green spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Coordination challenges in polycentric park management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of focus on the role of green areas in disease propagation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of dedicated park management","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emergence of demand for new services and perspectives on park management","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Organizational change shifting focus from aesthetics to ecological management","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large number of urban green spaces managed by municipalities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underfunded municipal public services leading to inadequate maintenance of green spaces","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of public restrooms in municipal green spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in funding sources and management autonomy of public service agencies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of coordination between different municipal entities leading to ineffective management of urban green spaces","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient maintenance and operation decisions for urban green spaces due to fragmented responsibilities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited focus on green spaces within the public services office leading to neglect and underfunding","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear definition for neighborhood and urban parks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of regulatory focus on ecosystem services function of parks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underestimation of park scale and usage categories","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
